name: Spare Magazines
description:
Curdle Jam Project, with I think I going to develop on, currently in the early stages, as I think the project may grow I gladly expand on it, it's my second game, that I made properly, aka finished. So I am quite proud of it

You are trapped away from the world in dark corridors, with nothing but monsters and handful of bullets, how far will you go down it and uncover it mystery ? (Story not included yet, and won't be for a while)
